0.user_question: Six years ago, when Noah was half as old as Cera, the population of Chile was half what it is now. Currently, Cera is 46 years old. If the population of Chile six years ago was 3000 times the age of Noah, calculate the population of Chile now.

ost_step.1: Six years ago, Noah was half as old as Cera who is now 46.
ost_step.2: So Noah was 46/2 = 23 years old at that time.
ost_step.3: Six years later, Noah is 46 + 6 = 52 years old now.

direct_answer.text: Let's think step by step. Six years ago, Noah was half as old as Cera, so he was 46/2 = 23 years old. That makes it 6 years ago, the population of Chile was 3000*23 = 69,000. Today, Noah is 52 years old and the population of Chile is 69,000*2 = 138,000. The answer is: 138,000.
